segments.sourceMdx: import { newsletterStats } from "@site/src/newsletter";

segments.content: # For conference organizers
segments.sourceMdx: # For conference organizers

segments.content: Do you want to **promote your event** and **sell extra tickets**?
segments.sourceMdx: Do you want to **promote your event** and **sell extra tickets**?

segments.content: Our newsletter can be your **media partner** and help you achieve your goals, promoting your event for free to **{newsletterStats.all.subscribersCount} subscribers**
segments.sourceMdx: Our newsletter can be your **media partner** and help you achieve your goals, promoting your event for free to **{newsletterStats.all.subscribersCount} subscribers**

segments.content: In practice, this means that we **exchange visibility** with our respective audiences as part of a **cross-promotional operation**.
segments.sourceMdx: In practice, this means that we **exchange visibility** with our respective audiences as part of a **cross-promotional operation**.

segments.content:
:::tip[is this a good fit?]

[**This Week In React**](/) is a large newsletter for **mid/senior React and React Native developers** looking to stay up-to-date.

This audience is made up of **passionate and experienced developers**. We believe this partnership is a good fit for both sides:

- Our audience is **likely to buy conference tickets and workshops**
- Your audience is likely to sign up to our newsletter and keep reading it over time

:::
segments.sourceMdx:
:::tip[is this a good fit?]

[**This Week In React**](/) is a large newsletter for **mid/senior React and React Native developers** looking to stay up-to-date.

This audience is made up of **passionate and experienced developers**. We believe this partnership is a good fit for both sides:

- Your audience is likely to sign up to our newsletter and keep reading it over time

:::

segments.content: ## Conferences we partner with
segments.sourceMdx: ## Conferences we partner with

segments.content: We prefer to partner with conferences that meet the following criteria:
segments.sourceMdx: We prefer to partner with conferences that meet the following criteria:

segments.content:
* The conference is essentially about React and/or React Native
* The conference takes place on site, with over 300 participants
* The conference is taking place in Europe or the United States
segments.sourceMdx:
- The conference is essentially about React and/or React Native
- The conference takes place on site, with over 300 participants
- The conference is taking place in Europe or the United States

segments.content: If you don't meet all the criteria, don't worry, you can always get in touch with us, and we'll figure this out.
segments.sourceMdx: If you don't meet all the criteria, don't worry, you can always get in touch with us, and we'll figure this out.

segments.content:
:::info[Our previous partners]

We already partnered with those conferences:

- [React Summit - Amsterdam](https://reactsummit.com/)
- [React Advanced - London](https://reactadvanced.com/)
- [App.js - Krak贸w](https://appjs.co/)
- [React Native EU - Wrocaw](https://www.react-native.eu/)
- [Chain React - Portland](https://chainreactconf.com/)
- [React.js Day - Verona](https://2023.reactjsday.it/)
- [React Connection - Paris](https://reactconnection.io/)
- [React Native Connection - Paris](https://reactnativeconnection.io/)
- [React Paris](https://react.paris/)

These conferences usually report some **extra ticket sales** attributed to our promo code, and consider this partnership to be worthwhile.

:::
segments.sourceMdx:
:::info[Our previous partners]

segments.content: ## Partnership execution
segments.sourceMdx: ## Partnership execution

segments.content: Here's how we generally execute this kind of media partnership.
segments.sourceMdx: Here's how we generally execute this kind of media partnership.

segments.content: ### What we do
segments.sourceMdx: ### What we do

segments.content:
* We mention once the conference in the newsletter intro ([example](/newsletter/159))
* We mention it 3 times ([example](/newsletter/159#react)) at key events (early birds, CFP, speakers announcement...)
segments.sourceMdx:
- We mention once the conference in the newsletter intro ([example](/newsletter/159))
- We mention it 3 times ([example](/newsletter/159#react)) at key events (early birds, CFP, speakers announcement...)

segments.content: ### What you do
segments.sourceMdx: ### What you do

segments.content:
* You print and distribute our [Flyer (A5 leaflet format)](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1tVoR3u5qERjt9hwyNQQMJzax3iYEKcsL) in the conference bag
* You put our [logo](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1029GIVDLUizLhhz0xNAdDlMnPhsQ3_f7) on your homepage with a do-follow backlink (with `?utm_source=<YOUR_CONF_NAME>`)
* You mention us once in your conference newsletter (with `?utm_source=<YOUR_CONF_NAME>`)
* You offer discount of at least 10% on tickets with promo code `TWIR`, also useful for tracking
segments.sourceMdx:
- You print and distribute our [Flyer (A5 leaflet format)](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1tVoR3u5qERjt9hwyNQQMJzax3iYEKcsL) in the conference bag
- You put our [logo](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1029GIVDLUizLhhz0xNAdDlMnPhsQ3_f7) on your homepage with a do-follow backlink (with `?utm_source=<YOUR_CONF_NAME>`)
- You mention us once in your conference newsletter (with `?utm_source=<YOUR_CONF_NAME>`)
- You offer discount of at least 10% on tickets with promo code `TWIR`, also useful for tracking

segments.content: ### Other options
segments.sourceMdx: ### Other options

segments.content: We are open to negotiating other practices to give you the visibility we both need, such as:
segments.sourceMdx: We are open to negotiating other practices to give you the visibility we both need, such as:

segments.content:
* Social media mentions
* Additional newsletter inclusions
* Creation of a conf summary blog post, that we both distribute
* Anything else that benefit both of us
segments.sourceMdx:
- Social media mentions
- Additional newsletter inclusions
- Creation of a conf summary blog post, that we both distribute
- Anything else that benefit both of us

segments.content: ### Ready to execute?
segments.sourceMdx: ### Ready to execute?

segments.content: If this media partnership interests you, please reach out to [sebastien@thisweekinreact.com](mailto:sebastien@thisweekinreact.com?subject=%3CCONF_NAME%3E%20x%20This%20Week%20In%20React%20-%20Media%20Partnership).
segments.sourceMdx: If this media partnership interests you, please reach out to [sebastien@thisweekinreact.com](mailto:sebastien@thisweekinreact.com?subject=%3CCONF_NAME%3E%20x%20This%20Week%20In%20React%20-%20Media%20Partnership).

segments.content: To facilitate the execution of this partnership, it is preferable to provide us with all the relevant information about your conf upfront. In particular, knowing the key events of the conference you want us to promote ahead of time, and their respective dates, will help us better orchestrate things.
segments.sourceMdx: To facilitate the execution of this partnership, it is preferable to provide us with all the relevant information about your conf upfront. In particular, knowing the key events of the conference you want us to promote ahead of time, and their respective dates, will help us better orchestrate things.

segments.content: Here's a useful email template you can use.
segments.sourceMdx: Here's a useful email template you can use.

segments.content:
```bash title="Subject: <CONF_NAME> x This Week In React - Media Partnership"
Hi,

We would like to establish a conference media with your newsletter.

Here are the details of our conference:
- Name:
- Date:
- Location:
- Number of participants:
- Topics:

We would like to promote our conference at those key events:
- newsletter intro mention - dd/MM/yyyy - Conf scheduled, early birds
- newsletter mention 1 - dd/MM/yyyy - CFP is opening / closing soon
- newsletter mention 2 - dd/MM/yyyy - Speakers announcement + 3 representative headliners
- newsletter mention 3 - dd/MM/yyyy - Last call, late birds

(these key events are examples, and not strict requirements: feel free to suggest whatever helps you get conversions)

We agree to:
- print and distribute your flyer in our swag bag
- put your logo on our homepage with a do-follow backlink
- mention our newsletter in your newsletter
- offer a discount 10%+ with promo code TWIR

... Other details you would like to discuss ...
```
segments.sourceMdx:
```bash title="Subject: <CONF_NAME> x This Week In React - Media Partnership"

- offer a discount 10%+ with promo code TWIR

... Other details you would like to discuss ...
```

segments.content:
:::tip[About newsletter mentions]

Use our [public calendar](https://thisweekinreact.com/calendar) to know when we plan to send out an issue on which we can mention your conf.

We usually **normalize** conf mentions and **write the text ourselves**, taking into consideration what you want to highlight. If you want to provide a text, keep it super short, within these 2 sizes:

-  [App.js Conf](https://appjs.co/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 叼 Krak贸w - 22-24 May. Get a [10% discount](https://ti.to/appjs/2024/discount/TWIR) with code "TWIR".
-  [React Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 仇 Amsterdam - 14-18 June - Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". Awesome lineup including Evan Bacon, Kent C. Dodds, Theo, Tim Neutkens, Mark Erikson, Fred Schott and so many others!

:::
segments.sourceMdx:

:::
